name: Install_DBSproc
author: Lauro PM, Vanegas-Arroyave N, Huang L, Taylor PA, Zaghloul KA, Lungu C, Saad ZS, Horovitz SG
description: Installs the demo archive for DBS processing tools

inputs.description: Use wget to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl
inputs.name: Use wget

inputs.description: Use curl to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl
inputs.name: Use curl
